Comments_List: It helped me to develop an analytical view of the international trade economic models that exist. Also, I developed the criteria to agree or disagree the statements that economists discuss.
I learned how to better speak in groups and write on economic subjects.

I have developed analytical skills. I now can think critically on many research papers, because I have acquired knowledge that helps me decide whether or not a statement is correct. I have learnt about many interesting topics that didn't come up to often in my mind.  I also realized that certain policies or decisions have major impacts on not only the participants, but on the whole world.
I learned different trade theories and how trade can affect a country's GDP

I have learnt theories in international economics in this course. Though I have heard of some of them before, I gained new understandings of them, which is of great help to my further study. The homework of this course is also beneficial. Writing review paper is a new experience for me, and my critical thinking really got practiced during the process. In addition, the papers assigned in this course are helpful. Some are classical ones and some deal with current issues. I've gained lots of knowledge and increased my reading ability throughout this course.

As a foreign student, I read the papers at an slower pace and a few of them were hard to fully understand; that is something that I have to work on. On the other hand, I could understand all the models taught in class. I consider that my strength.
